Name: Average time from Manuscript Export Succeeded to Plagiarism Originality Report Completed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed'

Name: Total time between Manuscript Export Succeeded and SW-Checklist Completed across all variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Minimum time it takes Manuscript Export Succeeded to be followed by SW-Awaiting AE Assignment
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Average time for Manuscript Export Succeeded to occur after Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Total resolution time of Manuscript Export Succeeded in cases that eventually lead to SW-EIC Accept
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Time from Manuscript Export Succeeded to SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants where reviewer assignment succeeds on the first attempt
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time between Manuscript Export Succeeded and SW-Initial Reviewer Selection in high-complexity variants (those containing more than three reviewer-related activities)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Minimum time from Manuscript Export Succeeded to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in accepted manuscripts
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Elapsed time between Manuscript Export Succeeded and the first occurrence of any SW-Reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time it takes Manuscript Export Succeeded to be followed by the next non-system administrative activity in rejected versus revised submissions
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-EIC Reject'

Name: Time of Manuscript Export Succeeded relative to the start of the case in variants that include Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Average waiting time to Manuscript Export Succeeded after Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation in variants that trigger plagiarism checks
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Cycle Time of Manuscript Export Succeeded measured from its timestamp to the timestamp of the subsequent mandatory validation activity (Plagiarism Originality Report Completed or SW-Checklist Completed, whichever occurs first)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed'

Name: Total time from Manuscript Export Succeeded to Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation in cases involving major or minor revisions
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
